name: Pet of the Week – Fabio
description: Meet this week's Pet of the Week, Fabio! Fabio is an Angora rabbit from our Bonita shelter with luxuriously soft fur. He's a very outgoing little guy who isn't shy around new friends!

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: Meet this week’s Pet of the Week, Fabio! Fabio is an Angora rabbit from our Bonita shelter with luxuriously soft fur. He’s a very outgoing little guy who isn’t shy around new friends! If you’re interested in adopting Fabio, please visit www.SDDAC.com.
